about_the_game:
Explore the ruins of your own mind in this 2D metroidvainia action game. Fight the dozens of monster species that have multiplied there, while at the same time constantly running away from yourself. Explore over 150 levels filled with mazes, enemies, and lore. Grow strong with every experience point you collect and every flashback you endure. And finally, when the time is ready...

DESTROY
THE
WALL

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains psychological horror and references to traumatic events from the main character's past.

short_description: 2D metroidvainia action with a unique control scheme. Guide a snake constantly chasing your cursor--but be sure not to let them touch. Explore the decaying landscape of your own psyche and fight its monsters so you can become strong enough to destroy the wall that's always been holding you back
